subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The 18-year-old Agnieszka Radwanska, seeded No. 30 from Poland, sent defending champion Maria Sharapova packing with a 6-4, 1-6, 6-2 upset in the third round.
snippet: The 18-year-old Agnieszka Radwanska, seeded No. 30 from Poland, sent defending champion Maria Sharapova packing with a 6-4, 1-6, 6-2 upset in the third round.
